scripts.test: : run test coverage; trap 'tput cnorm' INT; c8 --extension .ts npm --scripts-prepend-node-path=auto run test:only
scripts.test:only: : run test suite once; trap 'tput cnorm' INT; ts-mocha test/**/*.ts $WATCHPARAMS --exit; tput cnorm
scripts.test:watch: : watch running test suite; trap 'tput cnorm' INT; WATCHPARAMS='-w --watch-extensions ts,yml' npm --scripts-prepend-node-path=auto run test:only
